item.title: Why Do Eye Floaters Feel Worse When I'm Tired?
item.description:
It’s the end of the day. You’re drained. You finally sit down to relax — and suddenly, the floaters are back with a vengeance.

They feel bigger. Bolder. Like they’re dancing right in your face.

So you wonder:

Why do eye floaters feel worse when I’m tired?

You’re not imagining it. And you’re definitely not alone.
Let’s break down why this happens — and how to soften the effect.
